entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
